name: Men Who Make Broadway Musicals Quiz | Humanities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which is NOT a Stephen Sondheim musical?
options: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum
questions.explanation:
She Loves Me!.

	All three are well known works by Sondheim. "Loves" is by Jerry Bock.

questions.text: Which is NOT a musical by Andrew Lloyd Webber?
questions.explanation:
Pacific Overtures.

	These three are legendary hits for Sir Andrew. "Pacific", however, was one of the less successful efforts by Sondheim.

questions.text: Which is NOT a Rodgers and Hammerstein musical?
questions.explanation:
Brigadoon.

	"Music" and "Pacific" were huge hits; "Pipe Dream" was considerably less successful.  "Brigadoon" was by Lerner & Loewe.

Stephen Schwartz.

	The others are all fine talents, but these two belong to Schwartz. ("Godspell" featured the popular "Day by Day".)

questions.text: Which is NOT a musical that Stephen Sondheim was involved with?
options: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum
questions.explanation:
Fiddler on the Roof.

	All four are classics with countless memorable songs. "Fiddler", however, is by Jerry Bock.

questions.text: Which is NOT a musical by Rodgers and Hammerstein?
questions.explanation:
Man of LaMancha.

	Four more legendary shows - but "Man" wasn't by R&H. (It was by a relatively unknown team.)

questions.text: Which is NOT a Lerner & Loewe musical?
questions.explanation:
Music Man.

	"Lady and "Camelot" were huge hits. "Wagon" did well. "Music Man", however, was by Meredith Willson.

questions.text: Which is NOT a musical by Andrew Lloyd Webber?
options: Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat
questions.explanation:
Les Miserables.

	These three were successes (but not blockbusters). "Les Mis" was a monster hit - but not for Webber - it was by Claude-Michel Schonberg.

questions.text: Which is NOT a Sondheim musical?
options: Sunday in the Park with George
questions.explanation:
Rent.

	These three are "lesser" works of Sondheim. "Rent" is by Jonathan Larson.

questions.text: Which play is NOT by Jerry Herman?
questions.correct: Stop the World, I Want To Get Off
questions.explanation:
Stop the World, I Want To Get Off.

	"Mame" was a huge hit for Angela Lansbury. "Dolly" starred Carol Channing (and Pearl Bailey) - and everyone knows the Louis Armstrong version of the title song. "World" was the breakthrough writing and starring vehicle for Anthony Newley. (It featured "What Kind of Fool Am I?").
